attributes.action: To give key workers a complete Tax break. Until the end of the covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: To help support the the key workers and show them that they have not been forgotten.
attributes.background: You are giveing all person who has to stop working due to covid-19 80% off there pay to help them through this time. Also you are helping the self employed. But nothing to the key workers who are putting there life's on the line working to help others.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
